history.proof: qsimpl time: 1 use: is_lim_ext_loc,R. srun best use: is_lim_continuity unfold: ex_finite_lim.

exceptions.tactic: apply is_lim_ext_loc with (g := fun y : R => x).
exceptions.exn: In environment f : R -> R x : R Unable to unify "R -> Prop" with "R".

original: apply is_lim_ext_loc with (g := fun y : R => x). - unfold Rbar_locally'. intros y. simpl. reflexivity. - unfold is_lim. destruct x. + intros eps. unfold Rbar_locally'. intros y. simpl. lra. + intros M. unfold Rbar_locally'. intros y. simpl. lra. + intros M. unfold Rbar_locally'. intros y. simpl. lra.
